name: normalize-css
description: A modern alternative to CSS resets
author: KunalTanwar <kunaltanwar2@gmail.com>

scripts.finalize-normalize: sass scss/normalize.scss --no-source-map -s compressed css/normalize.min.css && postcss css/normalize.min.css -u autoprefixer --no-map -r
scripts.finalize-normalize-inter: sass scss/normalize.inter.scss --no-source-map -s compressed css/normalize.inter.min.css && postcss css/normalize.inter.min.css -u autoprefixer --no-map -r
